snippet.title: Sparkball - Official Gameplay Trailer!
snippet.description:
Sparkball's first ever Early Access event, "Ascension Weekend", takes place on June 30. You can learn more and sign up to play at http://sparkball.gg . Be sure to join http://discord.gg/SparkadiaGG for opportunities to receive a key and meet your future teammates/rivals!

---

Sparkball (PC), is a 4v4 competitive action 'Mobrawler' where teams must balance ballin' and brawlin' to score in the enemy team's goal! Affectionately described as League of Legends meets Rocket League, Sparkball packs an immediate punch to grip players and backs it up with a surprising level of depth as they itemize their hero and learn the power of elite teamwork!

---

What is Sparkadia?
Sparkadia is the multimedia IP/universe that Sparkball takes place in. Created by Worldspark Studios, a AAA development studio led by former Rioters, Sparkadia is focused on providing immersive experiences that fill our audiences with optimism and empower everyone to find the unique spark inside them.

---

Links:
Website: http://sparkadia.gg/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/SparkadiaGG
Discord: http://discord.gg/SparkadiaGG
Twitch: http://twitch.tv/SparkadiaGG
